game.name: Le Mans Ultimate
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Le Mans is a continually evolving story... powered by emotion, speed and glory. Le Mans Ultimate - the official game of the FIA World Endurance Championship and 24 Hours of Le Mans.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Le Mans is a continually evolving story... powered by emotion, speed and glory. Le Mans Ultimate - the official game of the FIA World Endurance Championship and 24 Hours of Le Mans.

reviewHighlights.text: The newly added driver badge system is quite wrong. It was developed for the purpose of sanctioning non-manner users, but the criteria for evaluating...
언리얼 엔진이라 차량만 좋아보이지 트랙은 디테일 별루다. 트렉주변 색표현, 나무의 디테일, 전반적으로 컬러가 죽은듯 생동감이 적다
